title: Strengthening Service Quality Practical Competencies: Action Learning-Based Science Leadership Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can systematically diagnose scientific problems occurring in real work environments and design solutions.
Learners can execute problem-solving processes by collaborating with team members in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can establish and present an action plan to improve organizational scientific capabilities based on action learning outcomes.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
